title: client freezing when i close it then try to open it again
body:

replies.body: I'm not familiar with this error message. Can you grab a screenshot of it when it happens? Also, where is your client freezing? Is it in champ select? Additionally, are you using the Legacy Client or the new Beta Client? These details will help me understand which steps will resolve this.
